entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
